title: Lags
body: After updating the game, I have noticed some incredible lags while playing Twisted Treeline. All other games work perfectly tho. Is anyone else dacing the same problem?

replies.body:
hello everyone,
I just want to leave a msg, 
I just uninstall this shit game, full of lags and bug talon E never works, and lack of precision, lags with smite, i got normal ping rate but still lags like hell.
so buy riot, try to correct this.

What are "lags"?

Network latency? Input latency? low maximum fps, minimum fps? screentear or stutter? packet loss?

never heard of most of the things you listed above but my net is working well.
i'll tell you what's hgappening exactly: try to use an ability, it doesn't work. after a few seconds the game does what I wanted to do a while back. 

(I'm not talking about the delay of the ability because it's something normal)

That is serious network problems.

Most likely packet loss (communication never arriving) or large ping spikes (delays in communication).

Is someone streaming video on the same network, or torrenting/large downloads?
